name: Traverse (GoldMan0710)
description:
Traverse is a puzzle game in wich players have to think out of the box to create bridges with blocks. As you proceed further into the ancient temple, bigger and difficulter rooms will hold you from proceeding.

Short  but challenging, Traverse is a puzzle game that bring a new twist on familiar-looking blocks. As you proceed through the empty rooms of a long forgotten temple, the player will encounter new blocks with different properties asking the player to think twice before placing said block. 

Each of the 13 levels bring a new challenge for the player to solve.
